main event: Multiple unusual lights were observed traveling at high speed in a circular pattern over Concord Center, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The lights were reported to be circular in shape and whitish in color with rounded edges., Witnesses observed the lights moving from left to right and then reversing course., The maximum number of lights seen at any one time was three., No sound was detected during the sighting., The objects were visible for about 20 to 25 minutes before disappearing behind trees.
sighted object: lights traveling in a circular pattern
witness description: Mrs. Abgo Balto reported the sighting after being informed by a neighbor.
